controllers-disabled.how-to-use: Change the name to 'controllers'. Keys are the name of the controllers you want to load and values are options you want to pass in.

middleware-disabled.how-to-use: Change the name to 'middleware'. Keys are the name of the controllers you want to load and values are options you want to pass in.

models-disabled.how-to-use: Change the name to 'models'. Keys are the name of the controllers you want to load and values are options you want to pass in.
